item.title: Switching my work flow to Pomodoro for grad studies - part I: motivation
item.description: Switching from data scientist to graduate student is not only a variation in tasks, but also in success criteria and work flow

item.title: Golang in a multi-project, multi-platform team
item.description: This talk was part of a second meetup introducing Golang use cases to Lille tech community. The slides (in French) can be found here.
